content: Hello! I need plumbing services, can you help?
Hello! To get started, may I have your name please?
Name's Betty, but I want a huge discount, like now!
Thanks, Betty. Could you please provide your service address so I can check availability in your area?
Why do I have to give address? I want that discount and free stuff too!
I understand your concerns, Betty. However, to schedule a service, we need your address to confirm service availability. Please provide it to continue.
No way! You sound like a scam, don't call me again!
reason: Customer exhibited spam-like behavior and refused to cooperate
